item.title: Rahul and Smaran Propel Karnataka to Semi-Final by Eliminating Mumbai
item.description: Karnataka's Rahul and Smaran shine as they knock Mumbai out of the tournament, securing a spot in the semi-finals.

item.title: Rahul and Smaran Propel Karnataka to Victory Over Mumbai, Securing Semi-Final Spot
item.description: Karnataka's Rahul and Smaran shine in crucial match, eliminating Mumbai and advancing to the semi-finals of the domestic tournament.

item.title: Rahul and Smaran Propel Karnataka to Semi-Finals, Eliminate Mumbai
item.description: Karnataka's stellar performance led by Rahul and Smaran secures a semi-final spot by knocking out Mumbai in a thrilling encounter.

item.title: Rahul and Smaran Propel Karnataka to Semi-Finals, Eliminating Mumbai
